commands.name: upcoming-holidays
commands.title: List Upcoming Holidays
commands.description: Allows you to see the upcoming holidays for a country and region (if applicable)

commands.name: all-holidays
commands.title: List All Holidays
commands.description: Allows you to see all the holidays, past and future, for a country and region (if applicable)

commands.name: past-holidays
commands.title: List Past Holidays
commands.description: Allows you to see all the past holidays for a country and region (if applicable)

commands.name: today-holidays
commands.title: List Today's Holiday
commands.description: Allows you to see all holidays happening today for a country and region (if applicable)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
